nodes.text: Tosi-karu was a Sernpidalian goddess. When the Praetorite Vong used the Yo'gand's Core tactic to pull one Sernpidal's moons, Dobido, into the planet in 25 ABY, the Sernpidalians believed this to be the arrival of Tosi-karu, and panicked accordingly and/or prayed in the streets instead of fleeing from the falling moon.
